snippet.title: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café | Trailer
snippet.description:
📣 *WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM!* 💌
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2428800?utm_campaign=youtube_trailerS24
____________________________________
Have you ever wanted to escape from the stress of urban life? *Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café* is a cozy and relaxing decoration and rhythm game where you manage a café and befriend cute animals.

🧘‍♀️ Low stress, non confrontational, relaxing experience.
☕ Manage your own cafeteria: Customize your place with furniture, decorations, lamps, wallpaper, and flooring. Take pictures of your favourite corners, dishes, and customers and share them on the café's website.
🦊 Adorable customers: Forge friendships and learn about their favourite recipes and decorations.
🪇 Learn new recipes... To the beat! Prepare snacks and drinks, from waffles to sodas, to the rhythm of upbeat tunes and colourful animations.
🎨 Unleash your creativity! Practice your skills whenever you like. Experiment with new ingredient combinations and sell them in your own vending machine to earn rewards!
👒 And if you're into fashion... Use your design skills to create custom T-shirts! Pair them with accessories and give them away to customers.
____________________________________

You can find me here:
🐦 https://twitter.com/anaisenserio
🪪 https://anaissalla.carrd.co/
